newsitem.title: JAPAN: INSIGHT - JGBs seen rising towards recent high.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - JGBs seen rising towards recent high.

text.p: FUTURE RANGE/DAY SPPRT RSTNC RSI-9 MA-5 MA-25
OUTLOOK OF BOJ OPERATION AT 0020 GMT: drainage of 300 bln yen -------------VIEWS FROM THE MARKET - June 30------------------

*Key September 10-year Japanese government bond (JGB) futures contract likely to rise toward recent high of 124.41 on Monday. *But further rises above that level difficult without investors' cash buying, trader said. *Focus whether Nikkei stock average manages to rise to key 21,000 level. *September seen firmly underpinned at around 124.00.
